question: 111X111=?
solution:
111X111 = 12321
Step 1:- Find no. of 1â€™s in given number = 3
Step 2:- Write 1234â€¦.. upto number of 1â€™s in given number in ascending order i.e. 123
Step 3:- Than write descending nos. upto 1, next to previous no. i.e. 12321

question: 65X65=?
solution:
65X65=4225
Step 1:- Multiply the left part/digit to the left part/digit plus one: 6X (6+1) =42
Step 2:- Write the number “25” next to the number from first step: 4225
